alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 28 at 12:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by thunderstorms producing heavy rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Castle Country, San Rafael Swell and Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs. * WHEN...Through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Additionally, elevated potential for flash flooding and debris flow off of recent burn scars. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
